doc: Mention required workload when building with MSVC

events.message: doc: Mention required workload when building with MSVC

events.body: Do we need all the individual components from the "Desktop development with C++" workload when building with MSVC?

> Do we need all the individual components from the "Desktop development with C++" workload when building with MSVC?

No, we don't. The default ones are just enough.

Correct me if i'm mistaken, but the `Visual Studio Build Tools component`, when following the provided link, is only available at the bottom of the page and hidden behind a drop down menu titled `Tools for Visual Studio`. Perhaps mention this here so that someone doesn't give up and end up downloading Visual Studio 2022 in frustration of not finding the target download.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->
